full_summary:
# Invitation to Tender

## Notice Title
Large Round Straw Bales - Lacombe, Alberta (cb-8659-13313912)

## Notice Information
- **Public Notice Date**: August 31, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2023 (16:00:00)

## Solicitation and Contract Details
- **Reference Number**: cb-8659-13313912
- **Solicitation Number**: 01R11-24-C036
- **Contracting Entity**: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Contract Objectives
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites tenders for the supply and delivery of Large Round Wheat or Barley Straw Bales to the Lacombe Research & Development Centre. The contract includes the supply of up to 950 Large Round Wheat or Barley Straw Bales, with a maximum moisture content of 20%.unte

## Bid Requirements
Successful Bidder's bales will be tested to verify moisture content. Facilities are non-smoking and scent-free. AAFC will supply equipment and labour for off-loading bales.

## Tender Documents
The tender package is available in English and French:

- **English**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8659/rfp---english.pdf
- **French**: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8659/rfp---french.pdf

## Contact Information
For further information, please contact Zack Flamont:

- **Email**: zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca
- **Phone**: (639) 560-3462
- **Address**: 2010 12th Avenue, Regina, Saskatchewan, S4P 0M3

Please ensure you read and follow all bidding instructions carefully to ensure a successful tender submission.
